resources.string: Use only numbers without spaces or other spacers. For example: 291239845
Last known location can be sent immediately, but can be incorrect. The real location will still be sent within a few minutes.
Error: Could not add new item to list
The app doesn\'t work in background

Due to Android restrictions, we can\'t guarantee that app will be able to always work in background. Try not to remove it from recent apps list. Ensure that this app is allowed to run in background (Settings - Apps). Disable battery saver mode.
The app doesn\'t send last known location

The app can send last known location only if the system can provide it. If Android can\'t provide the last known location (for example, because you has GPS disabled for a long time), the app won\'t send anything.
The app doesn\'t collect any data. Google Location services are used for location requests. Their use is regulated by Google Privacy Policy.
